dataIdInfo.idAbs: Choose one or more tags from a given cruise.

tool.name: SelectTag

param.name: Species
param.expression: Blue | Bow | Fin | Gray | Hump | RightN | RightS | Sperm
param.dialogReference:
Choose a species.

NOTE: The "Cruise" box will only be populated once a choice is made.

param.name: Cruise
param.dialogReference:
Choose a cruise (field season)

NOTE: All tags deployed as part of this cruise will be in the list of PTT's below, regardless of the "Species" chosen above.

param.name: ptt List
param.dialogReference: Choose one or more PTT's. A new <p_> Feature Class will be created in your Geodatabase, as well as a Feature Layer in your map table of contents (TOC).

tool.summary: Choose one or more tags from a given cruise.
tool.usage:
NOTE:

  • If you haven't already, you will need to create a new File Geodatabase (GDB) in a suitable local folder.

  • You will then need to assign the new GDB as your [Current Workspace] before using the filter tools.

  • Geoprocessing menu->Environments->Workspace->Current Workspace
